nodes.text: The Mygeeto theater was one of the six theaters of operations of the Outer Rim Sieges, which took place during the final stages of the Clone Wars.
The Mygeeto theater was located in the Outer Rim Territories, in a region known as the New Territories. This field of operations was named after the key Separatist world of Mygeeto.

In the Mygeeto theater, Jedi General Plo Koon broke the Separatist defenses at the Ywllandr system, clearing the way to the key InterGalactic Banking Clan world of Mygeeto. Consequently, Jedi General Ki-Adi-Mundi led the Galactic Marines in an assault against the IGBC citadels of Mygeeto.
